DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_V1_PIZZA_TOTAL_VALOR
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 (CONVERT(VARCHAR,COUNT(A.HANDLE)) +
 ' - ' +
 CASE
 WHEN A.TEMPERATURA = 1 THEN 'NEUTRO'
 WHEN A.TEMPERATURA = 2 THEN 'FIRME'
 WHEN A.TEMPERATURA = 3 THEN 'RISCO'
 END +
 ' : R$ '+
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 REPLACE(
 convert(varchar,cast(CAST(SUM(VALORTOTAL) as decimal) as money), 1),
 '.','|'),
 ',','.'),
 '|',',')) TEMPERATURA,
 CASE
 WHEN A.TEMPERATURA = 1 THEN '#2c82c9'
 WHEN A.TEMPERATURA = 2 THEN '#26c281'
 WHEN A.TEMPERATURA = 3 THEN '#f03434'
 END COR,
 ROUND(SUM(A.VALORTOTAL),2) VALOR
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES A
JOIN K_CRM_FASESOPORTUNIDADE B ON A.STATUSOPORTUNIDADE = B.HANDLE
WHERE @CRITERIOSELECAO
GROUP BY A.TEMPERATURA


" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="TEMPERATURA" From="A" Path="TEMPERATURA" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> <DecimalField Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
